name: The Pobjoy Special
overview:
The Pobjoy Special is a highflying text-based-adventure game developed and published by A&B Computing in 1984. Your beloved old car has developed engine trouble. The Chief Mechanic shakes hishead dolefully.

"Supplies of these spares have dried up completely since Mr. Pobjoy disappeared", he says. "I'm afraid you'll have to locate some yourself".
